data.name: ReadAccrualSuspension
data.value: select top(1) FRQ_SUSP_ID, SUSPEND_DT, RESUME_DT, RED_PCT, OTR_TYPE, OTY_ID, OBG_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_ID, REDUCTION_AMOUNT from CKT_ACCR_SUSP where (@otrId = OTR_ID) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@obgId = OBG_ID) and (@otyId = OTY_ID) and (@otrType = OTR_TYPE) and (SUSPEND_DT <= @suspendDt) and (RESUME_DT > @suspendDt)
